attributes.action: Create a cycle track from Milford Haven to Johnston or Haverfordwest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years there have been commuters and with the incresing emphasis on environmental impact and healthy living there should be more done to encourage people to cycle to work rather than use public transport or cars. 

Currently there is no cycle track between Milford Haven and Johnston in Pembrokeshire, Wales and this stretch of road is hazardous to pedestrians and cyclists. 

I would like to petition for a cycle track to be built to enable more people to commutefrom Milford Haven to Johnston and vice versa, or even have a direct cycle track built from Milford Haven to Haverfordwest that doesn't focus on the scenic route but rather to enable people to get to the desired location as quickly and as safely as possible.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
